{"node_label":"Create Customer Training","execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"docTypeJson":"{
        "doctype": "Customer Training",
        "service_call": "{{ doc.name }}",
        "serial_no": "{{ doc.serial_no }}",
        "customer": "{{ doc.customer }}",
        "machine_model": "{{ customer_training.machine_model }}",
        "hour_count": "{{ customer_training.hour_count if customer_training.hour_count else 0 }}",
        "customer_name": "{{ customer_training.customer_name if customer_training.customer_name else '' }}",
        "product_family": "{{ customer_training.product_family if customer_training.product_family else '' }}",
        "e_c_date": "{{ customer_training.e_c_date if customer_training.e_c_date else '' }}",
        "question_1": "{{ customer_training.question_1 if customer_training.question_1 else '' }}",

        "question_5": "{{ customer_training.question_5 if customer_training.question_5 else '' }}",
        "question_6": "{{ customer_training.question_6 if customer_training.question_6 else '' }}",
        "question_7": "{{ customer_training.question_7 if customer_training.question_7 else '' }}",
        "auto_purge": "{{ 1 if customer_training.auto_purge else 0 }}",

        "monitoring_function_using_auto_alarm": "{{ 1 if customer_training.monitoring_function_using_auto_alarm else 0 }}",
        "spc_data": "{{ 1 if customer_training.spc_data else 0 }}",

        "carriage_forward": "{{ 1 if customer_training.carriage_forward else 0 }}",

        "ejector_forward": "{{ 1 if customer_training.ejector_forward else 0 }}",
        "mold_height_negative": "{{ 1 if customer_training.mold_height_negative else 0 }}",
        "proportional_pressure_control": "{{ 1 if customer_training.proportional_pressure_control else 0 }}",
        "refilling": "{{ 1 if customer_training.refilling else 0 }}",
        "carriage_backward": "{{ 1 if customer_training.carriage_backward else 0 }}",

        "question_17": "{{ customer_training.question_17 if customer_training.question_17 else '' }}",

        "remark": "{{ customer_training.remark if customer_training.remark else '' }}"
}","variable_path_for_output":"customer_training_doc"}

{"node_label":"Create Mould Trial","execute_current_node_as_user":"","submit":true,"docTypeJson":"{
